price: Who perfected everything He created, and initiated the creation of man[3] from clay.
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡسَنَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقَهُۥۖ وَبَدَأَ خَلۡقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ مِن طِينٖ
footnotes: [3] i.e., the creation of Adam in an unprecedented manner.
